title: SMC_GCODE_WORD (Struct)
text:
TYPE SMC_GCODE_WORD : STRUCT
This data type includes the data of one G-code word like âN20â or âG1â.

rows.Name: fValue
rows.Comment:
Value asLREAL.  This value is used bySMC_NCDecoder.
If the SMC_GCODE_WORD is created programatically, this value
has to be set for all g-words (e.g. for âM5â, set it to 5.0).

rows.Name: diValue
rows.Comment:
Value asDINT.  Not used any more.  If the SMC_GCODE_WORD
is created programatically, we recommend to set this value
to TO_DINT(fValue).

rows.Name: pAdr
rows.Comment: If<>0, the value of this word is specified by a variable.pAdrpoints to this variable.

rows.Name: byLetter
rows.Comment: ASCII-code of the letter of the word, e.g. 69 for âFâ

rows.Name: byVarType
rows.Comment:
If<32, contains the variable type as defined inSMC_VARTYPE.If>=32, contains 32 + the variable type as defined
inIBaseLibrary.TypeClass
